title: Privacy Policy
content: <0>Privacy Policy</0>
<1>Information We Collect:</1>
When you visit Omar BR's Website, we may collect the following information:
- Your name (provided voluntarily through the contact form).
- Your email address (provided voluntarily through the contact form).
- Any other information you choose to share with us through the contact form.
<1>How We Use Your Information:</1>
We use the collected information for the following purposes:
- To respond to your inquiries and messages submitted through the contact form.
- To improve our website and services.
- To monitor website traffic and usage using Google Analytics (anonymized data).
<1>Data Security:</1>
We take data security seriously and implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, loss, or alteration.
<1>Third-Party Services:</1>

We use Google Analytics to analyze website traffic and usage. Google Analytics may collect anonymous data about your interactions with the website. Please refer to Google's Privacy Policy for more information on how they handle your data.
<1>Data Retention:</1>
We will retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Notice unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law.
<1>Changes to the Privacy Notice:</1>

We may update this Privacy Notice from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. The most current version will always be available on this page.
<2>Last Updated: July 16th, 2023</2>
